title: SprykerKit for PhpStorm
description:
Supports the development of Spryker applications with Intellij IDEA.

Features:
  • Create Spryker Module boilerplate based on your current context
  • Create Spryker Files and Folders based on your current context
  • Supported Layers Client, Glue, Service, Shared, Yves, Zed
  • Configure desired project namespace

title: PYZ for PhpStorm
description:
This plugin was created during the Turbine Kreuzberg Breakout Week as a learning project by a bunch of PHP developers.
  • Extend Spryker core classes, interfaces and xml files on project level (right-click -> Extend in PYZ / CTRL-ALT-E)
  • Open Spryker files on github.com (right-click -> View on GitHub / CTRL-ALT-G)
  • Goto-handling for Zed stub calls and their gateway controller actions (URLs are clickable)
  • Resolve usages of gateway controller actions in Zed stub calls

title: Spryker Debug
description: Collection of Spryker-compatible debug and development tools.

title: Contentful connector
description: A Spryker-Contentful connector. Import content from contentful to storage and updates it via cronjob.

title: Novalnet B2B Payment integration
description: Novalnet payment module for Spryker simplifies your daily work by automating the entire payment process, from checkout till collection. This module is designed to help you increase your sales by offering various payment methods on a one-page checkout. The module which is perfectly adjusted to the Spryker shop with top-quality range of services of the payment provider.

title: Novalnet B2C Marketplace Payment Integration
description: Novalnet payment module for Spryker simplifies your daily work by automating the entire payment process, from checkout till collection. This module is designed to help you increase your sales by offering various payment methods on a one-page checkout. The module which is perfectly adjusted to the Spryker shop with top-quality range of services of the payment provider.

title: Codeception Module
description: This module allows developers to test spryker modules isolated.

title: Two-factor Backend Authentication
description: Second Factor Authentication for the Spryker Administration Interface

title: Sentry.io integration
description: This package enables Sentry.io to work with your Spryker shop by extending the Monitoring Module of Spryker and adding other hooks to here and there to enhance the data in Sentry.
